appetizers.categoryDescription: Start your meal with our southern-style appetizers, from crispy fried favorites like corn nuggets and okra to unique offerings like gator nuggets and wings. Perfect for sharing or enjoying as a light meal.

items.name: Corn Nuggets
items.description: Golden fried corn nuggets with a crispy exterior and sweet corn center. Served with powdered sugar.

items.name: Fried Okra
items.description: Southern-style fried okra with a crispy breaded coating. Served with ranch dipping sauce.

items.name: Fried Pickles
items.description: Crispy fried dill pickle chips. Served with horseradish dipping sauce.

items.name: Onion Petals
items.description: Battered and fried onion petals with a crispy golden coating. Served with pink sauce.

items.name: Mac & Cheese Bites
items.description: Breaded and fried macaroni and cheese bites with melted cheese center.

items.name: Gator Nuggets
items.description: Crispy fried alligator meat nuggets. Served with ranch dipping sauce.

items.name: 10 Wings
items.description: Ten chicken wings tossed in your choice of mild, hot, or sweet sauce. Served with ranch or blue cheese dipping sauce.

items.name: 10 Wings & Fries
items.description: Ten chicken wings tossed in your choice of mild, hot, or sweet sauce. Served with crispy fries and ranch or blue cheese dipping sauce.

items.name: House Garden Salad
items.description: Fresh tossed greens with tomatoes, cucumber, and red onions. Choose your dressing: Ranch, Blue Cheese, Thousand Island, Italian, Balsamic Vinaigrette.

items.name: Bubbalou's Garden Salad
items.description: Fresh tossed greens topped with tomatoes, cucumber, and red onions with your choice of smoked pulled pork, pork, beef, turkey, or grilled chicken. Choose your dressing: Ranch, Blue Cheese, Thousand Island, Italian, Balsamic Vinaigrette.

kidsMeals.categoryDescription: Specially crafted meals for our youngest guests, featuring kid-friendly favorites from BBQ classics to comfort foods. All meals include one side that can be substituted at no cost, and a small beverage with free refills on drinks.

items.name: BBQ Chicken
items.description: Tender BBQ chicken served with fries and a small beverage. Side can be substituted at no cost, free refills on drinks.

items.name: Corn Dog
items.description: Classic corn dog on a stick served with fries and a small beverage. Side can be substituted at no cost, free refills on drinks.

items.name: Mac & Cheese
items.description: Creamy macaroni and cheese with garlic bread and a small beverage. Side can be substituted at no cost, free refills on drinks.

items.name: Chicken Strips
items.description: Crispy chicken strips served with fries and a small beverage. Side can be substituted at no cost, free refills on drinks.

items.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
items.description: Smoked pulled pork sandwich served with fries and a small beverage. Side can be substituted at no cost, free refills on drinks.

items.name: Spare Ribs
items.description: Tender spare ribs served with garlic bread and a small beverage. Side can be substituted at no cost, free refills on drinks.

items.name: Small Beef Sandwich
items.description: Small BBQ beef sandwich served with fries and a small beverage. Side can be substituted at no cost, free refills on drinks.

items.name: Small Pork Sandwich
items.description: Small BBQ pork sandwich served with fries and a small beverage. Side can be substituted at no cost, free refills on drinks.

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: Juicy cheeseburger served with fries and a small beverage. Side can be substituted at no cost, free refills on drinks.

sandwiches.categoryDescription: Our signature BBQ sandwiches featuring slow-smoked meats from tender brisket and pulled pork to unique offerings like catfish and gator. Served on buttered buns with the option to upgrade to garlic bread at no cost.

items.description: Sliced BBQ beef or pork served on a buttered sandwich bun. Upgrade to garlic bread at no cost.

items.name: Sliced BBQ Beef or Pork Sandwich - Large
items.description: Large portion of sliced BBQ beef or pork served on a buttered sandwich bun. Upgrade to garlic bread at no cost.

dinners.categoryDescription: Our signature dinner platters featuring generous portions of slow-smoked BBQ meats, from classic beef and pork to seafood and poultry. Served as a complete southern meal with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, all sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Sliced BBQ Beef Dinner
items.description: Tender sliced BBQ beef. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Sliced BBQ Pork Dinner
items.description: Tender sliced BBQ pork. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Pulled Pork Dinner
items.description: Our signature pulled pork dinner. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.description: Smoked turkey dinner. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Shrimp Dinner
items.description: Fried shrimp dinner served with fresh cocktail sauce. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Fried Catfish Dinner
items.description: Two pieces of fried catfish dinner served with tartar sauce. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Pulled Chicken Dinner
items.description: Tender pulled chicken dinner. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Brisket Dinner
items.description: Our famous smoked brisket dinner. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Spare Ribs Dinner
items.description: Tender spare ribs dinner. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Baby Back Ribs Dinner
items.description: Fall-off-the-bone baby back ribs dinner. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

combos.categoryDescription: Perfect combinations of our most popular meats, allowing you to sample multiple BBQ favorites in one meal. From classic two-meat combos to our signature Bubbalou's Special featuring four different meats. Served as a complete southern meal with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, all sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Brisket & Pulled Pork Combo
items.description: Perfect combination of our famous brisket and signature pulled pork. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Spare Ribs & Chicken Combo
items.description: Tender spare ribs paired with juicy chicken. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Any 2 Meat Combo
items.description: Choose any two of your favorite meats. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Baby Backs & Shrimp Combo
items.description: Premium baby back ribs with fried shrimp served with tartar sauce. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: Bubbalou's Special
items.description: Our signature combo featuring spare ribs, chicken, beef, and pork. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

items.name: 3 Pig Platter
items.description: The ultimate pork lover's platter with pulled pork, sliced pork, and spare ribs. Served with fries, baked beans, cole slaw, and garlic bread, sides can be substituted at no cost.

byThePound.categoryDescription: Perfect for takeout, parties, or family gatherings, our meats by the pound let you enjoy our slow-smoked BBQ at home. From tender brisket and pulled pork to whole chickens and baby back ribs, available in half-pound and full-pound portions.

items.name: Sliced Beef - 1/2 Pound
items.description: Half pound of tender sliced BBQ beef, perfect for a hearty meal.

items.name: Sliced Beef - 1 Pound
items.description: Full pound of tender sliced BBQ beef, great for sharing or leftovers.

items.name: Sliced Pork - 1/2 Pound
items.description: Half pound of juicy sliced BBQ pork, slow-smoked to perfection.

items.name: Sliced Pork - 1 Pound
items.description: Full pound of juicy sliced BBQ pork, enough for the whole family.

items.name: Pulled Pork - 1/2 Pound
items.description: Half pound of our signature pulled pork, hand-pulled and smothered in BBQ sauce.

items.name: Pulled Pork - 1 Pound
items.description: Full pound of our signature pulled pork, perfect for parties and gatherings.

items.name: Pulled Chicken - 1/2 Pound
items.description: Half pound of tender pulled chicken, perfectly seasoned and smoked.

items.name: Pulled Chicken - 1 Pound
items.description: Full pound of tender pulled chicken, ideal for feeding a crowd.

items.name: Brisket - 1/2 Pound
items.description: Half pound of our famous smoked brisket, tender and full of flavor.

items.name: Brisket - 1 Pound
items.description: Full pound of our famous smoked brisket, the ultimate BBQ experience.

items.name: 1/2 Chicken
items.description: Half of a whole smoked chicken, juicy and flavorful with crispy skin.

items.name: Whole Chicken
items.description: Complete whole smoked chicken, perfect for family meals or special occasions.

items.name: Baby Back Ribs - 1 Slab
items.description: Full slab of tender baby back ribs, fall-off-the-bone delicious.

drinks.categoryDescription: Quench your thirst with our selection of beverages, from refreshing fountain drinks with free refills to bottled options including Cheerwine and domestic and imported beers. Perfect accompaniments to any BBQ meal.

items.name: Milk
items.description: Cold, fresh whole milk.

items.name: Bottled Water
items.description: Bottled water.

items.name: Cheerwine
items.description: Bottled Cheerwine cherry cola.

items.name: Fountain Drinks - Regular
items.description: Choose from: Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Starry, Mug Root Beer, Dr. Pepper, Mountain Dew, Lemonade, Cheerwine, Sweet Tea, Unsweet Tea. Free refills included.

items.name: Fountain Drinks - Large
items.description: Choose from: Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Starry, Mug Root Beer, Dr. Pepper, Mountain Dew, Lemonade, Cheerwine, Sweet Tea, Unsweet Tea. Free refills included.

items.name: Bottled Beer - Domestic
items.description: Choose from popular domestic beers: Budweiser, Coors Light, Miller Lite, Bud Light, Michelob Ultra, Corona, Blue Moon, Yuengling, Sam Adams, Pabst Blue Ribbon.

items.name: Bottled Beer - Imported
items.description: Choose from popular imported beers: Heineken, Stella Artois, Guinness, Dos Equis, Modelo Especial, Peroni, Amstel Light, Beck's, Carlsberg, Kronenbourg 1664.

desserts.categoryDescription: End your meal on a sweet note with our homemade southern desserts, from rich chocolate brownies to classic cakes and traditional pies. Each dessert is made fresh daily using time-honored recipes.

items.name: Brownies
items.description: Rich, fudgy chocolate brownie with a perfect chewy texture and chocolate chips.

items.name: Carrot Cake Slice
items.description: Moist carrot cake with cream cheese frosting, loaded with fresh carrots and warm spices.

items.name: Red Velvet Cake Slice
items.description: Classic red velvet cake with smooth cream cheese frosting and a hint of cocoa.

items.name: Chocolate Cake Slice
items.description: Decadent chocolate cake with rich chocolate frosting and a moist, tender crumb.

items.name: Sweet Potato Pie
items.description: Traditional Southern sweet potato pie with warm spices and a flaky crust.

items.name: Pecan Pie
items.description: Classic pecan pie with a golden brown filling and crunchy pecan topping.

sides.categoryDescription: Complete your BBQ experience with our southern-style sides, from classic favorites like baked beans and cole slaw to hearty options like Brunswick stew and collard greens. Available in individual portions, pints, quarts, and gallons for any occasion.

items.name: Dill Pickle
items.description: Crisp, whole tangy dill pickle with perfect crunch and bold flavor.

items.name: Garlic Bread
items.description: 2 warm, buttery pieces of garlic bread with golden crust and aromatic garlic butter.

items.name: Corn Bread
items.description: 2 pieces of moist, sweet cornbread with golden crust and perfect crumb texture with butter on the side.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Crispy golden fries seasoned with our signature blend of spices.

items.name: Fried Corn on the Cob
items.description: Sweet corn on the cob battered and fried to golden perfection with crispy coating and butter on the side.

items.name: Brunswick Stew with Corn Bread
items.description: Hearty southern stew with tender meat and vegetables, served with warm cornbread.

items.name: Collard Greens with Corn Bread
items.description: Slow-cooked collard greens with smoky bacon, served with warm cornbread.

items.name: Veggie Plate - Any 4 Vegetables
items.description: Choose any four of our delicious southern-style vegetables for a perfect vegetarian meal.

items.name: Side
items.description: Choose from: Baked Beans, Cole Slaw, Green Beans, Black-Eyed Peas, Texas Caviar, Mashed Potatoes, Brunswick Stew, Collard Greens, Potato Salad, Mac & Cheese

items.name: Pint
items.description: Choose from: Baked Beans, Cole Slaw, Green Beans, Black-Eyed Peas, Texas Caviar, Mashed Potatoes, Brunswick Stew, Collard Greens, Potato Salad, Mac & Cheese

items.name: Quart
items.description: Choose from: Baked Beans, Cole Slaw, Green Beans, Black-Eyed Peas, Texas Caviar, Mashed Potatoes, Brunswick Stew, Collard Greens, Potato Salad, Mac & Cheese

items.name: Gallon
items.description: Choose from: Baked Beans, Cole Slaw, Green Beans, Black-Eyed Peas, Texas Caviar, Mashed Potatoes, Brunswick Stew, Collard Greens, Potato Salad, Mac & Cheese

bbqSauce.categoryDescription: Take home the taste of Bubbalou's with our signature BBQ sauces, available in five delicious varieties from sweet and mild to hot and killer and our special mustard BBQ sauce. Perfect for dipping, topping, or cooking, available in small and large portions for any need.

items.name: Extra Side of BBQ Sauce - Small
items.description: Small portion of our signature BBQ sauce for dipping or topping. Choose from: Sweet, Mild, Hot, Killer, Mustard BBQ.

items.name: Extra Side of BBQ Sauce - Large
items.description: Large portion of our signature BBQ sauce for dipping or topping. Choose from: Sweet, Mild, Hot, Killer, Mustard BBQ.

items.name: Bottle of BBQ Sauce - Small
items.description: Take home our signature BBQ sauce in a small bottle. Choose from: Sweet, Mild, Hot, Killer, Mustard BBQ.

items.name: Bottle of BBQ Sauce - Large
items.description: Take home our signature BBQ sauce in a large bottle. Choose from: Sweet, Mild, Hot, Killer, Mustard BBQ.
